name: NWProtocolUDP
desc: A network protocol for connections that use the User Datagram Protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolUDP.Options
items.desc: A container of options for configuring how UDP is used on a connection.

items.name: static let definition: NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The system definition of the User Datagram Protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolUDP.Metadata
items.desc: A container representing UDP when sending and receiving packets.
